DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to Evaluate and Compare Safety and Pharmacokinetics of the HCP1004 and VIMOVO 500/20mg in Healthy Korean Male
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate and Compare Safety and Pharmacokinetics of the HCP1004 and VIMOVO 500/20mg in Healthy Korean Male
DOC.criteria: BMI: 18.0 27.0 kg/m2 Willingness to sign the written Informed Consent Form Evidence of clinically relevant pathology History of relevant drug and food allergies Positive screen on drugs of abuse Participation in a drug study within 60 days prior to drug administration.
